Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to gas station credit cards
Summary: Relates to gas station credit cards; requires gas stations charge the same rate for purchases of gasoline made by gas station credit cards as they charge for purchases made by cash.
LawCode: Add ยง518-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to credit cards issued by gas stations
